20721.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Allow me to introduce Purutte, who is
regrettably one of the two victims in this case.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20721.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「こちらは　今回の事件の
　被害者のひとり　プルッテさんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20721.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 이쪽이 이번 사건의
　피해자 중 한 명인 프룻테 씨다.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20721.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>这位就是这次事件的其中一位被害者，
普尔特。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20721.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>這位就是這次事件的其中一位被害者，
普爾特。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20722.en: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Are you going to save my darling Hepporo?<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20722.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「ううっ　あなたが　ヘッポロを……
　あたしのダーリンを　助けてくれるんですか！？<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20722.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 으흑, 당신이 헵포로를……
　제 달링을 구해 주실 분인가요!?<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20722.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>呜呜！你会帮我把哈佩罗……
把我丈夫救出来吗？！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20722.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>嗚嗚！你會幫我把哈佩羅……
把我老公救出來嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20723.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Purutte and her husband, Hepporo, are
adventurers who were exploring a cave
called Pupella Tunnel.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20723.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「彼女は　ご主人とともに　冒険者をしている。
　探索のために　プペラトンネルという
　洞くつに　入ったということなのだが……。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20723.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 프룻테 씨 부부는 모험가인데
　탐색을 위해 푸페라 터널이라는
　동굴에 들어갔다더군…….<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20723.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>她和她丈夫都是冒险者。
他们夫妻二人进到一个叫朴佩拉隧道的洞窟
去探索……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20723.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>她和她先生都是冒險者。
他們夫妻二人進到一個叫朴佩拉隧道的
洞窟去探索……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20724.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>While exploring, they were attacked by a
group of Pogoin' Penguins. Hepporo valiantly
held them off so his wife could escape.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20724.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「そこで　タップペンギーの集団に見つかり
　ご主人のヘッポロさんは　彼女を逃がすため
　おとりとして　洞くつ内に　残ったそうだ。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20724.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 그곳에서 탭 펭기 무리와 마주쳤고
　남편인 헵포로 씨는 아내가 탈출할 수 있도록
　미끼가 되어 동굴에 남았다고 해.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20724.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>结果碰上一群踢踏企鹅，
先生哈佩罗为了让妻子逃走，
自己留在里面当诱饵了。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20724.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>結果碰上一群踢踏企鵝，
先生哈佩羅為了讓太太逃走，
自己留在裡面當誘餌了。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20725.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Your task this time is to rescue Mr. Hepporo
from the cave. Can you do it?<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20725.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「君には　ヘッポロさんの救出を　頼みたいのだ。
　この依頼　やってもらえるか？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20725.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 자네에게 헵포로 씨 구출을 부탁하고 싶어.
　이 의뢰, 수락해 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20725.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>我要委托你把哈佩罗救出来。
你愿意接下这个工作吗？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20725.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>我要委託你把哈佩羅救出來。
你願意接下這個工作嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
You have been offered a quest.
Will you accept it?
<select>
Yes
No
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

20726.en: <start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>You'll do it? That's great news!<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20726.ja: <start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「やってもらえるか！　助かるぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20726.ko: <start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 수락해 주는 건가! 고맙다!<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20726.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>你愿意啊！太好了！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20726.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>你願意啊！太好了！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20727.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Hepporo's life may be in danger. Please
hurry to Pupella Tunnel, located west of
Megistris Territory. You must hurry to his aid!<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20727.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「ヘッポロさんの命が心配だ。
　プペラトンネルは　メギストリス領の西にある。
　急いで　救出に向かってくれ！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20727.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 헵포로 씨의 목숨이 걱정이야.
　푸페라 터널은 메기스투리스령 서쪽에 있다.
　어서 구출하러 가 줘!<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20727.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>我很担心哈佩罗的安危。
朴佩拉隧道位于麦奇斯翠丝领地西部，
请你尽快去救他！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20727.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>我很擔心哈佩羅的性命安危。
朴佩拉隧道就在麥奇斯翠絲領土的西邊。
盡快去救人吧！<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

27335.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>It seems like you are really busy and
already have a lot of requests going. <stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27335.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「むっ　君は　たくさんの依頼を
　抱えているようではないか。
　忙しいのは　よく　わかるが……。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27335.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 앗, 자네는 많은 의뢰를
　받은 상태인 것 같군.
　바쁘다는 건 잘 알겠지만…….<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27335.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>唔！你手上好像还有
很多委托呢。
我知道你很忙……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27335.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>唔！你手上好像還有
很多委託呢。
我知道你很忙……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27336.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Hepporo's safety is in jeopardy, we can't
afford to leave this in your hands if you're
already so busy.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27336.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「こちらの依頼は　人命が　かかっている。
　他の依頼に　追われているようでは
　まかせることは　できない。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27336.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 우리 의뢰에는 사람의 목숨이 달려 있어.
　다른 의뢰에 쫓기는 상태로
　맡길 수는 없다.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27336.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>但是这件委托关系到人命，
如果你要忙其他工作，
我就不能把这件委托交给你。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27336.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>但是這件委託關係到人命，
如果你要忙其他工作，
我就不能把這件委託交給你。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27337.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Damn it...
Hepporo's life could be at stake...<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27337.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「くっ……。
　このままでは　ヘッポロさんの命が……。<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27337.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 윽…….
　이대로라면 헵포로 씨의 목숨이…….<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27337.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>唔……！
这样下去哈佩罗的命就……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27337.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>唔……！
這樣下去哈佩羅的命就……<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20728.en: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Please, please save my darling Hepporo...<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20728.ja: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「ダーリンを　よろしく　お願いします……。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20728.ko: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 달링을 잘 부탁드려요…….<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20728.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>我丈夫就拜托你了……<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20728.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>我老公就拜託你了……<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20729.en:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Ugh...
Please hurry and finish up your other business.<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20729.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「うう……。どうか　急いで
　他の依頼を　済ませてきてください。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20729.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 으흑……. 어서
　다른 의뢰를 처리하고 와 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20729.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>呜呜……请你尽快
解决其他的工作。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20729.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>嗚嗚……請你盡快
解決其他的工作。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20730.en:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Waaaaaah!
My sweet darling!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20730.ja: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「うわ～ん。ダ～～～リ～～～ン！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20730.ko: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 으아앙~ 달~~~리~~~잉!!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20730.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>呜啊～我～～的～～丈～～夫～～！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20730.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>嗚啊～我～～的～～老～～公～～！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20731.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>It looks like you are handling the mission
pretty well so far, <cs_pchero>...<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20731.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「任務は　順調のようだな　<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20731.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 임무 진행은 순조로운가 보군, <cs_pchero>.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20731.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>看来你的任务很顺利呢，<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20731.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>看來你的任務很順利呢，<cs_pchero>。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20732.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>But this is a high risk mission with lives at
stake. Failure is not an acceptable outcome.
That's why I've come to help you.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20732.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「だが　これは　人命のかかった救出依頼だ。
　失敗は　絶対に許されない。
　ゆえに　私が　応援に来たのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20732.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이건 인명이 걸린 구출 임무.
　실패는 절대 용납되지 않아.
　그래서 내가 지원하러 온 거다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20732.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>不过，这次委托你的工作攸关人命，
绝对不允许失败，
因此我来支援你了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20732.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>不過，這次委託你的工作攸關人命，
絕對不允許失敗，
因此我來支援你了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20733.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>...Good. It seems Hepporo is still alive.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20733.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「……よし。ヘッポロ殿は　まだ生きている。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20733.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: ……좋아, 헵포로 공은 아직 살아 있군.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20733.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……很好，哈佩罗阁下还活着。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20733.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……很好，哈佩羅閣下還活著。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20734.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Okay while you distract the Pogoin'
Penguins, I will rescue Lord Hepporo
and get him to safety.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20734.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「貴公が　タップペンギーを引きつけている間に
　私が　ヘッポロ殿を救出し
　安全な所まで　連れていこう。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20734.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 자네가 탭 펭기를 유인할 동안
　내가 헵포로 공을 구출해
　안전한 곳으로 데려가마.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20734.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>趁阁下引开踢踏企鹅的时候，
我会把哈佩罗阁下救出来，
带他到安全的地方。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20734.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>趁閣下引開踢踏企鵝的時候，
我會把哈佩羅閣下救出來，
帶他到安全的地方。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20735.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>There are many of them, but you have dealt
with them before. I'm sure you'll make do. Just
destroy them before they cause any more trouble.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20735.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「数は多いが　一度　戦った相手だ。
　貴公なら　負けることはないはず。
　これ以上の被害が出る前に　全滅させよ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20735.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 수는 많아도 한 번 싸워 본 상대다.
　자네 실력이라면 질 일은 없겠지.
　추가 피해가 생기기 전에 놈들을 전멸시키자.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20735.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>它们数量多，但毕竟是对付过的怪物，
阁下的话一定会赢。
在引发更严重的灾情前，把它们全部歼灭吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20735.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>牠們數量多，但畢竟是對付過的怪物，
閣下的話一定會贏。
在引發更嚴重的災情前，把牠們全部殲滅吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20737.ja: <start_lip_sync m02700 _normal m00001>「グラァァァァァ！！<stop_lip_animation m02700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20738.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, I'm glad you made it. I know it was
a long way, but anyone who couldn't make it isn't
fit to be a member of the Armamentalist Corps.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20738.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>。逃げずに　よく来た。
　任務を　途中で投げだすような者は
　魔法戦士団の一員には　ふさわしくない。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20738.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 도망치지 않고 다시 오다니
　훌륭하군. 중간에 임무를 포기하는 자는
　마법 전사단의 일원이 될 자격이 없어.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20738.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，阁下没有逃走呢。
会中途放弃任务的人，
不配成为魔法战士团的一员。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20738.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，閣下沒有逃走呢。
會中途放棄任務的人，
不配成為魔法戰士團的一員。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20739.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>If you don't distract the Pogoin' Penguin,
I be able to get to Lord Hepporo.
Please be more careful this time around.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20739.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「貴公が　タップペンギーを引きつけねば
　ヘッポロ殿に　近づくことができないのだ。
　今度は　ぬかりなく　頼むぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20739.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 자네가 탭 펭기를 유인해야
　내가 헵포로 공에게 다가갈 수 있다.
　이번에는 실수하지 말고 잘해 다오.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20739.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>要是你不把踢踏企鹅引开，
我就没办法接近哈佩罗阁下。
请你这次一定要成功。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20739.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>要是你不把踢踏企鵝引開，
我就沒辦法接近哈佩羅閣下。
請你這次一定要成功。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20741.ja: <start_lip_sync m02700 _normal m00001>「グララァァッ！！<stop_lip_animation m02700 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20743.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Come on <cs_pchero>, this way!
I have Hepporo now.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20743.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「こっちだ　<cs_pchero>！
　ヘッポロ殿は　だいじょうぶだ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20743.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 이쪽이다, <cs_pchero>!
　헵포로 공은 무사해.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20743.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>在这边，<cs_pchero>！
哈佩罗阁下没事。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20743.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>在這邊，<cs_pchero>！
哈佩羅閣下沒事。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20744.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, we were able to defeat the
monsters and save our clients life. <stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20744.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ご苦労だった。
　おかげで　人命救助と魔物討伐を
　両方とも果たすことが　できたな。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20744.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 수고 많았다.
　덕분에 인명 구조와 마물 토벌
　두 가지 임무를 모두 완수할 수 있었다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20744.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>辛苦了。
多亏有你，我们既救到了人，
也成功讨伐了怪物。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20744.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>辛苦了。
多虧有你，我們既救到了人，
也成功討伐了怪物。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20745.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>There is someone waiting for your
return. I'll take you to them.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20745.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ヘッポロ殿の帰りを　待っている人がいる。
　私が　連れていこう。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20745.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 헵포로 공을 애타게 기다리는 사람이 있으니
　내가 모셔다드리도록 하지.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20745.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>有人在等哈佩罗阁下回去。
我来带他走吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20745.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>有人在等哈佩羅閣下回去。
我來帶他走吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20746.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><pc> you should report to Mr. Poppumi.
I'll meet you back at Megistris Castle.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20746.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「貴公は　ポップミ殿に　完了報告をせよ。
　では　メギストリス城で　落ち合おう。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20746.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 자네는 포프미 공에게
　임무 완료 보고를 하도록.
　그럼 메기스투리스성에서 만나기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20746.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>阁下去向波普密阁下报告，任务已经完成了。
我们在麦奇斯翠丝城见。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20746.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>閣下去向波普密閣下報告，任務已經完成了。
我們在麥奇斯翠絲城見。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20747.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>I apologize for the delay. I brought
Mr. Hepporo back with me.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20747.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「遅くなって　申し訳ない。
　ヘッポロ殿を　お連れした。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20747.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 늦어서 미안하군.
　헵포로 공을 데려왔다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20747.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>抱歉，来晚了。
我把哈佩罗阁下带回来了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20747.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>抱歉，我來晚了。
我把哈佩羅閣下帶回來了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20748.en:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Ohhhh, my darling!
I'm so glad you're safe!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20748.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「あああ　ダ～リン～！
　生きてて　よかった～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20748.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 아아아, 달~링~!
　무사해서 다행이야~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20748.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，老公！
幸好你还活着！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20748.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>啊啊啊，老公！
幸好你還活著！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20749.en:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>Oh you silly woman. There's no way I
could leave you behind.<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20749.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>「ばっかだな。おまえを置いて
　死ねるわけねえだろうがよ。<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20749.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>: 바보같이.
　당신을 두고 어떻게 죽겠어.<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20749.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>笨蛋，我怎么可能丢下你一个人死掉呢？<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20749.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>笨蛋，我怎麼可能丟下妳一個人死掉呢？<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20750.en: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Ohh darling... I love you!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20750.ja: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「うわ～ん　ダ～リン。愛してるよ～～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20750.ko: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 으아앙~ 달링~ 사랑해~~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20750.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>呜呜，老公，我爱你！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20750.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，老公，我愛你！！<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20751.en:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>You old fool, you're embarrassing yourself
in front of everyone. But... I love you too!<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20751.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>「ばかやろぉ。人前で　恥ずかしいじゃねぇか。
　……おれも　愛してるぜ！！<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20751.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>: 바보같이. 남들 앞에서 민망하게.
　……나도 사랑해!!<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20751.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>笨蛋，当着别人的面说这种话，丢不丢人啊。
……我也爱你！！<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20751.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>笨蛋，當著別人的面說這種話，丟不丟人啊。
……我也愛妳！！<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20752.en:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>Thank you for helping us. I don't have anything
to reward you with because we live hand-to-mouth
but I hope you will accept my thanks.<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20752.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>「助けてくれて　ありがとよぉ。
　その日暮らしなもんで　礼とか　できねえけど
　カンベンしてくれよな。<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20752.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>: 구해 줘서 고맙다.
　하루 벌어 먹고사는 처지라
　따로 답례는 못 하지만 이해해 줘.<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20752.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>谢谢你救了我。
但是很抱歉，我风餐露宿，
没什么东西可以答谢你。<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20752.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01477 _normal m00001>謝謝妳救了我。
但是很抱歉，我的生活並不優渥，
沒什麼東西可以答謝妳。<stop_lip_animation n01477 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20753.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>There's need to thank me. As an Armamentalist,
it's my duty to help those in need.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20753.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「いや。礼には及ばない。
　魔法戦士として　当然の任務を果たしたまでだ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20753.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 아니, 답례는 필요 없다.
　마법 전사로서 임무를 수행한 것뿐이니까.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20753.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>没关系，举手之劳，用不着道谢。
这只是魔法战士的本分罢了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20753.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>沒關係，舉手之勞，用不著道謝。
我只是完成魔法戰士的本分罷了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20754.en:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>Well then, we're going to be headed out.
It's about time we started our next adventure
together!<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20754.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　あたしたちは　これで……。
　また　ふたりで　冒険の旅に出ます。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20754.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>: 그럼 저희는 이만…….
　다시 둘이 함께 모험을 떠날게요.<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20754.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>那么，就此告辞了……
我们两个要继续踏上冒险之旅。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20754.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01478 _normal m00001>那麼，我們就此告辭了……
我們兩個要繼續踏上冒險之旅。<stop_lip_animation n01478 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20755.en:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>Well I guess that settles it. My thanks to the
Verinard Armamentalist Corps for their efforts.
I will have your reward sent to Verinard Castle.<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20755.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>「これで　依頼は解決ですな。
　ヴェリナード魔法戦士団の活躍に　感謝いたす。
　報酬は　ヴェリナード城へ　送ればよいですな？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20755.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>: 이걸로 의뢰는 해결됐군요.
　베리나드 마법 전사단의 도움에 감사드립니다.
　보수는 베리나드성으로 보내면 될까요?<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20755.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>这样任务就完成了。
感谢威里纳德魔法战士团的帮忙，
报酬送到威里纳德城就行了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20755.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00991 _normal m00001>這樣任務就完成了。
感謝威里納德魔法戰士團的幫忙，
報酬送到威里納德城就行了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00991 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20756.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>I appreciate it.
Now, if you'll excuse us...<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20756.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「手数をかけるが　それで　お願いする。
　では　我々も　失礼させていただく。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20756.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 번거롭겠지만 그렇게 해 주면 고맙겠군.
　그럼 우리도 이만 실례하지.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20756.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>嗯，麻烦阁下了。
那么，我们也告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20756.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>嗯，麻煩閣下了。
那麼，我們也告辭了。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20757.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>...It must be nice to be in love.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20757.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「……愛する者がいるのは　よいことだな。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20757.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: ……사랑하는 사람이 있다는 건 좋은 일이군.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20757.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……有心上人真是一件好事。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20757.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……有心上人真是一件好事。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20758.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001> ...Sorry. Forget what I said. It's nothing.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20758.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「……すまない。なんでもないのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20758.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: ……미안하다. 아무것도 아니다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20758.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……抱歉，没什么。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20758.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>……抱歉，沒什麼。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20759.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Come on, <pc>. Let's go home
and claim that reward.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20759.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「さあ　帰るぞ　<pc>。
　貴公に　報酬を渡さなくてはな。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20759.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 돌아가지, <pc>.
　자네에게 보수를 줘야 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20759.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>好，我们回去吧，<pc>。
还得将报酬交给阁下才行呢。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20759.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>好，我們回去吧，<pc>。
還得將報酬交給閣下才行呢。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20760.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Oh you just got back, too?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20760.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「貴公も　今　戻ったところか。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20760.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 자네도 지금 돌아온 건가.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20760.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>阁下也刚回来啊。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20760.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>閣下也剛剛回來啊。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20761.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ノーラン。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20762.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>How long do you intend to settle for the
position of a guardsman?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20762.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「いつまで　衛士の立場に
　甘んじているつもりだ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20762.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 언제까지 위사에 안주할 셈이지?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20762.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>你甘愿就这样继续当卫士吗？<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20762.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>你甘願就這樣繼續當衛士嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20764.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>... Please, come inside.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20764.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「……中へ入るがいい。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20765.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>I hope you can figure out this Pogoin'
Penguin problem as soon as possible.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20765.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「フッ……ユナティ！
　その　タップペンギーの件だが
　早急に　原因を突きとめてもらいたい。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20765.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 후우…… 유나티!
　그 탭 펭기 건 말이다만
　어서 원인을 규명해 주기 바란다.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20765.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>呼……尤娜迪！
我希望你能
尽快查清踢踏企鹅一事。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20765.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>呼……尤娜堤！
我希望妳能盡快查清踢踏企鵝一事。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20766.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>It's a dangerous situation. The Armamentalist
Corps members are being scattered to
different parts of the world at the same time.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20766.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「魔法戦士団の者たちが　同時に
　世界各地へ送られていく　この状況は危険だ。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20766.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 마법 전사단원들이 동시에
　세계 각지로 파견 나가 있다.
　이 상황은 위험해.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20766.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>魔法战士团的成员同时
被派遣到世界各地去了，这个情况很危险。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20766.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>魔法戰士團的成員同時
被派遣到世界各地去了，這個情況很危險。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20767.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Doesn't this seem similar to that
one time?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20767.ja: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「あのときと　似ているとは思わんか……。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20767.ko: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 그때와 비슷하다고 생각하지 않나……?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20767.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>不觉得和那个时候很像吗……？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20767.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>不覺得和那個時候很像嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20768.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Yeah. That time...<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20768.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「あのとき……。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20768.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>那个时候……<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20768.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>那個時候……<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20769.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Lord Meru has ordered me to see to the
situation personally. Do you understand
what this means?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20769.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「我輩は　メルー公より　直々に
　事態の収拾を　命じられたのだ。
　これが　どういうことか　わかるな？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20769.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 멜루 공께서 친히
　내게 사태 수습을 명하셨다.
　이게 무슨 뜻인지 알겠지?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20769.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>梅尔公爵亲自
命令我控制局势。
你懂这是什么意思吧？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20769.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>梅魯公爵親自下令，
要我解決狀況。
妳懂這是什麼意思吧？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20770.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Yes, I understand. I will begin preparing
immediately. We can request the
cooperation of the Guard as well.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20770.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「了解しました。すぐに　対策を講じます。
　私は　衛士団に　協力を求めに行きましょう。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20770.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 알겠습니다. 바로 대책을 세우죠.
　전 위사단에 협력을 구하러 가겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20770.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>知道了，我会立刻制订对策。
我去向卫士团寻求合作。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20770.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>知道了，我會立刻制訂對策。
我去向衛士團尋求合作。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20771.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Very well. I leave that to you. I will
manage the Armamentalist Corps on
my own in your absence.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20771.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「よろしい。そちらは　貴公に　まかせる。
　魔法戦士団への指示は　我輩が引き受けよう。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20771.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 그쪽은 자네에게 맡기지.
　마법 전사단에는 내가 지시를 내리겠다.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20771.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>很好，那边交给你了，
魔法战士团的指挥就交给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20771.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>很好，那邊交給妳了，
魔法戰士團的指揮就交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20772.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>It looks like I'll be busy for some time.
You may continue your armamentalist
training in the meanwhile.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20772.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「しばらくの間　私は　忙しくなる。
　貴公は　魔法戦士の修行を続けてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20772.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 난 당분간 바빠질 것 같다.
　자네는 마법 전사 수련을 계속하도록.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20772.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>这阵子我会比较忙，
阁下就继续魔法战士的修行吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20772.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>這陣子我會比較忙，
閣下就繼續魔法戰士的修行吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20773.en:
I'm going to need some time to work out a strategy to deal with this situation. Return here after some time has passed as I may
need your help.
20773.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「対策を練るには　時間が必要だからな。
　時を置いてから　魔法戦士となって
　私のもとへ　来てほしい。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20773.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 대책을 세우려면 시간이 걸릴 거다.
　어느 정도 시간이 지난 후에
　마법 전사가 되어 날 찾아와라.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20773.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>我需要一段时间才能订出对策。
过一段时间等你成为魔法战士后，
再来找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20773.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>我需要一段時間才能訂出對策。
過一段時間等你成為魔法戰士後，
再來找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20774.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Very well then, thank you for your assistance
with this mission!<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20774.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「では　任務　ご苦労だった！<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20774.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 그럼 임무 수고 많았다!<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20774.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>任务辛苦了！<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20774.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>任務辛苦了！<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
